info.title: Nostalgia API
info.description: API documentation for the Nostalgia project

post.description: Register a new user with Admin role. Returns user data and a token

200.description: Successful operation - User registered with Admin role

post.description: Returns a message and an access token

get.description: Returns a list of all categories

post.description: Creates a new category with optional image upload

items.example: The image must be an image.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific category

put.description: Updates an existing category with new information. Use application/json for best compatibility.

post.description: Updates an existing category with new information and optional image upload. Use this endpoint when you need to upload images.

get.description: Returns list of all available permissions
Returns a paginated list of products with optional filtering and search capabilities

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in product name, description, and product number

post.description: Creates a new product with JSON data. Use separate endpoint for image uploads.
Upload main image and additional images for an existing product

items.example: The image field must be an image.

get.summary: Get all images for a product

get.description: Returns the current authenticated user's information

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

tags.name: Product Image Management
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing product images
